title: Lincoln Center Festival
seo_description: The Lincoln Center Festival brings the best in dance, music, opera and theater from around the world to Manhattan.
preview: The Lincoln Center Festival brings the best in dance, music, opera and theater from around the world to Manhattan.
contents: The Lincoln Center Festival brings the best in dance, music, opera and theater from around the world to Manhattan. The event will feature a performance of Shakespeare's The Merchant of Venice with Jonathan Pryce of Pirates of the Caribbean and Game of Thrones.
